Docs.summary: Manages a collection of extensions for a .

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Add(object singletonExtension) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Add (singletonExtension As Object)
abstract member Add : obj -> unit override this.Add : obj -> unit

Docs.summary: Adds the specified extension to the collection of extensions.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When this overload is used, each workflow instance that requests this extension type will get the extension instance provided to this method. If each workflow instance should have its own instance of the extension, use the other <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> overload.
If any of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> overloads are called after <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.MakeReadOnly%2A>, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Add<T> (Func<T> extensionCreationFunction) where T : class;
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Add<class T>(class System.Func`1<!!T> extensionCreationFunction) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Add(Of T As Class) (extensionCreationFunction As Func(Of T))
abstract member Add : Func<'T (requires 'T : null)> -> unit (requires 'T : null) override this.Add : Func<'T (requires 'T : null)> -> unit (requires 'T : null)

Docs.typeparam: The type of extension to add.
Docs.param: The method that creates the extension.
Docs.summary: Registers a that is used to provide an instance of an extension when requested by a workflow instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When this overload is used, each workflow instance that requests this extension type will get a new instance of the extension. If a singleton extension is desired, use the other <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> overload.
If any of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> overloads are called after <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.MakeReadOnly%2A>, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void MakeReadOnly() cil managed

Docs.summary: Marks the collection of extensions as read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is called when a workflow host is prepared for execution. If any of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.Add%2A> overloads are called after <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager.MakeReadOnly%2A>, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
